item.description:
Would you like to take your real estate investing business to the next level???

Network with like minded individuals and professionals! This business and social networking event is designed specifically for those who make a living off real estate investing. This event is also for real estate professionals who can offer products or services to help investors succeed.

Boston Real Estate Entrepreneur Meetup events are designed to be unique by combining business networking, social networking and continuing education.

Event Agenda

6:00pm - 9:00pm -> Open Networking

Make it a great day,
Ruben
ruben@bostonrealestatesolutions.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a name tag
item.name: Boston Real Estate Solutions March Meetup
